alert.note: Alert for Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 17 at 4:05PM CST until November 18 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Isolated minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Kenedy Island, Willacy Island and Cameron Island Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Wave run-up may approach the dunes along narrow beaches. Beach equipment, such as umbrellas and chairs, could be moved by waves. Vehicles driving along narrow beaches may experience higher water levels. Elevated water levels may also occur across the Laguna Madre and South Bay, and along State Highway 4 west of Boca Chica State Park. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Coastal flooding will be most possible a few hours before, and after, high tide at 10:36 PM CST this evening.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cameron Island; Kenedy Island; Willacy Island
